Interface IUserService

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserService
public interface IUserService
Service interface for user-related operations. Follows Interface Segregation Principle by providing a focused contract.

  • Method Details

    • authenticate

      Optional<User> authenticate(String role, String nric, String password)
      Authenticates a user with the given credentials.
      Parameters:
      role - The role of the user (e.g., "Applicant", "HDBOfficer", "HDBManager")
      nric - The user's NRIC
      password - The user's password
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the authenticated user if successful, empty otherwise

    • changePassword

      boolean changePassword(String nric, String currentPassword, String newPassword)
      Changes a user's password.
      Parameters:
      nric - The user's NRIC
      currentPassword - The current password
      newPassword - The new password
      Returns:
      true if the password was changed successfully, false otherwise

    • getAllApplicants

      List<Applicant> getAllApplicants()
      Gets all applicants.
      Returns:
      A list of all applicants

    • getAllOfficers

      List<HDBOfficer> getAllOfficers()
      Gets all HDB officers.
      Returns:
      A list of all HDB officers

    • getAllManagers

      List<HDBManager> getAllManagers()
      Gets all HDB managers.
      Returns:
      A list of all HDB managers

    • getUserByNric

      Optional<User> getUserByNric(String nric)
      Gets a user by their NRIC.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC to search for
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the user if found, empty otherwise

    • getApplicantByNric

      Optional<Applicant> getApplicantByNric(String nric)
      Gets an applicant by their NRIC.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC to search for
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the applicant if found, empty otherwise

    • getOfficerByNric

      Optional<HDBOfficer> getOfficerByNric(String nric)
      Gets an HDB officer by their NRIC.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC to search for
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the HDB officer if found, empty otherwise

    • getManagerByNric

      Optional<HDBManager> getManagerByNric(String nric)
      Gets an HDB manager by their NRIC.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC to search for
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the HDB manager if found, empty otherwise

    • validateNric

      boolean validateNric(String nric)
      Validates a user's NRIC format.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC to validate
      Returns:
      true if the NRIC format is valid, false otherwise

    • validatePassword

      boolean validatePassword(String password)
      Validates a user's password.
      Parameters:
      password - The password to validate
      Returns:
      true if the password is valid, false otherwise
